name: Fever Delirium
description:
This small game is inspired by  a fever delirium I had every time I was sick as a kid. In my hallucination, a large quantity of spheres were present in both my room and my parents bedroom. While sleepwalking, I had to find a pair of matching spheres based on size alone.  I had to do this, before I woke up! However, I never did...

I hope you have more success than I did.. Good luck..

View Highscores @ the  BrokenPackage Website.
